meanings: 지독하다 [심하다] severe, violent, sharp, intense, hard, bitter, serious, heavy, foul(병이), [무섭다] terrible, dreadful, frightful, fearful, awful, gross, ghastly, [엄청나다] exorbitant, outrageous, [잔인하다] cruel, harsh, hard, inhuman.

vlive.korean: '3독이란 지독, 중독, 고독입니다.' "Those are commitment, addiction and solitude". 듣기 View video iKON : 브이나잇 from.동동 (아홉번째 밤)

examples.korean: The weather last summer was awful. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 작년 여름은 날씨가 지독[끔찍]했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
